entry.title: Thundercut Silk/Wool Blended Cutting Pad ****
entry.summary:
Vendor: Oberk
Type: Paint Correction
Price: 23.99

Oberk Thundercut Silk/Wool Blended Cutting Pad is a purpose-built, rotary cutting pad. Looking to make quick work of a heavy cutting job? This is the heavy machine-gun power for cutting down heavy, swirls, scratches without the extreme marring typical of pads in this range.

Why Wool and Silk? Wool has great natural cutting ability, with an additional large benefit of keeping temperatures low while performing aggressive polishing. High temperatures are a detailer's enemy that can lead to clear coat failure. Silk is blended into our fiber pad to further reduce heat and give an additional strength where needed.

  • Ideal for a 6” Backing plate; can be used on a 5” backing plate for more flexible usage.
  • Intended for rotary tool usage only. This is not an ideal product for dual-action tools.
  • 50/50 twisted 100% wool and silk blend material. Increased natural cutting ability with great heat control. 
  • Silk is one of the strongest known natural fibers in the world and has great properties for detailing.
  • Natural silk stabilizes and neutralizes heat buildup quickly.
  • Silk fiber is known as the finest natural fiber in the world and is only one denier. This creates a microfiber like product in terms of aggressiveness and the way it holds large amount of abrasive, but reduces the temperature in comparison to microfiber as well. Our unique natural blend fights heat while improving cutting ability all at the same time.
  • 🕷️ Spiderman would approve. Our silk is ethically and sustainably harvested.

entry.title: Oberk 32 oz. Ultimate Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Oberk
Type: Paint Correction
Price: 265.98 - 279.98 (2 variants)

The Ultimate kit, a customer request is finally here!

ULTIMATE 32 OZ. KIT CONTENTS:

  • (1x) 32 oz. Supreme Cut  
  • (1x) 32 oz. Supreme Polish 
  • (2x) Supreme Orange Microfiber Cutting Pad 
  • (2x) SupremeRed FoamPolishing Pad 
  • (4x) Yelloe Medium Grade pad 

Fueled by testing and developing products, Oberk was developed to reinvent the process of paint correction and produce superior products in the automotive and detailing industry.  Years of testing products throughout the world created a need to produce products that simplified a process to polishing any paintwork. Oberk products are formulated for the top tier professional, and enthusiast alike.

The Oberk Complete System was formulated to take the guesswork out of paint correction. Pads & Compounds made to work flawlessly together.

WHY BUY THIS PRODUCT?

  • Full line of Oberk Supreme Cut & Polish combo that removes light to severe paint defects. This product is intended for all levels of hardness of automotive paint.
  • Remove heavy scratches and swirl marks with Supreme Microfiber Cutting Pad & Supreme Cut compound. This is step 1 one of the Oberk Duo System.
  • Refine compounding marks and restore gloss and shine with Supreme Foam Polishing Pad & Supreme Polish. This is step 2 one of the Oberk Duo System.
  • Formulated without fillers; the results you see are the results you get
  • Optical grade micro abrasive technology for enhanced clarity and precision.

entry.title: Oberk 2-step System 32 oz. Compound & Polish (No pads included)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Oberk
Type: Paint Correction
Price: 139.97

This package is for compound and polish only, with no pads are included. Although the system was engineered and designed to be used in conjunction with all Oberk product lines, there is no issues to use your own product mix combined with other pads.

Fueled by testing and developing products, Oberk was developed to reinvent the process of paint correction and produce superior products in the automotive and detailing industry.  Years of testing products throughout the world created a need to produce products that simplified a process to polishing any paintwork. Oberk products are formulated for the top tier professional, and enthusiast alike.

The Oberk Duo Package was formulated to take the guesswork out of paint correction.

Why buy this product?

  • Full line of Oberk Supreme Cut & Polish combo that removes light to severe paint defects. This product is intended for all levels of hardness of automotive paint.
  • Remove heavy scratches and swirl marks with Supreme Microfiber Cutting Pad & Supreme Cut compound. This is step 1 one of the Oberk Duo System.
  • Refine compounding marks and restore gloss and shine with Supreme Foam Polishing Pad & Supreme Polish. This is step 2 one of the Oberk Duo System.
  • Formulated without fillers; the results you see are the results you get.
  • Optical grade micro abrasive technology for enhanced clarity and precision.

What comes in the 32 oz. Oberk Duo Package (No Pads Included)?

  • (1) 32 oz. Supreme Cut 
  • (1) 32 oz. Supreme polish 

How to use the Oberk Duo Package?

NOTE: Wash, clean, & decontaminate the car prior to using any car paint correction products. Shake bottles before use. Avoid use on hot surfaces or in direct sunlight.

DUO STEP 1: Correction Stage

    1. Prime Oberk Orange microfiber cutting pad with Supreme Cut. Use 4-6 pea-sized drops. Apply 2 pea-sized dots of product on sections after work. Work in 16 x 16" areas and handle product until a fine film develops. Remove residue with a quality microfiber towel.
    2. Once heavy scratches and swirl marks are removed, move on to Duo Step 2 to remove finer scratches and marks.
DUO STEP 2: Finishing Stage
    1. Prime Oberk Red foam polishing pad with Supreme Polish. Use 4-6 pea-sized drops. Apply 2 pea-sized dots of product on sections after work. Work in 2 x 2' areas and handle product until a fine film develops. Remove residue with a quality microfiber towel.

    2. Once heavy scratches and swirl marks are removed, move on to Duo Step 2 to remove finer scratches and marks.

entry.title: Oberk Supreme Polish Step 2
entry.summary:
Vendor: Oberk
Type: Paint Correction
Price: 27.98 - 299.99 (3 variants)

Oberk Supreme Polish (SP) now available in our bulk, 1-gallon size. Currently the product does not come with a plunger. Purchasing in bulk is over $40 savings from buying 32 oz. bottles.

FEATURES

  • Perfect for use on all types of machines including DA, forced rotation, rotary, and long throw DA machines
  • Water based formula provides a superior option when used on all types of foam and microfiber pads.
  • Silicone free, and body shop safe
  • No fillers
  • Works all most automotive finishes and gel coat
  • Use as a one step polish or as a second step after Oberk Supreme Cut
  • Currently, no dispenser or plunger is included.

INSTRUCTIONS

This is step 2 in the Oberk Supreme DUO system. This polish is considered a finishing or fine scratches removal polish.

entry.title: Oberk Supreme Cut Step 1
entry.summary:
Vendor: Oberk
Type: Paint Correction
Price: 27.99 - 279.99 (3 variants)

Oberk Supreme Cut (SC) was formulated to provide a premium option for compounding or heavy polishing. With the most innovative and premium abrasives in the world, this polish combines unmatched cutting ability, and offers incomparable results. This compound is required for step 1 in the Oberk Supreme DUO system.

Removes p1500 sanding marks.
Perfect for use on all types of machines including DA, forced rotation, rotary, and long throw DA machines.
Water based formula provides a superior option when used on all types of foam, wool, and microfiber pads.
Silicone free, and body shop safe
Works all most automotive finishes and gel coat.
Use when removing sanding marks in new paint, and cutting heavy defects and swirls in cured paint.
Oberk uses absolutely no fillers.

INSTRUCTIONS

DUO STEP 1: Correction Stage

Suggested pad to use: Oberk orange Microfiber Cutting pad.

  1. Always lightly prime the pad to avoid dry buffing. Apply 4 pea sized dots to the face of foam or microfiber cutting pad, wool pads may require additional product. 
  2. Spread product over a 16 x 16"area, and polish. Wipe excess residue, and inspect.

If any holograms or marring is visible, follow up with Step 2 using Oberk Supreme Polish.

entry.title: Oberk Supreme Microfiber Cutting Pad
entry.summary:
Vendor: Oberk
Type: Paint Correction
Price: 10.99 - 15.99 (3 variants)

Oberk SMFC (Supreme Microfiber Cutting Pad) is the leader in microfiber cutting pads within the polishing industry globally. With a blend and denier to provide maximum cutting power, but soft enough to finish as well or better than most foam cutting pads. The unique blend of fibers and the perfect length, reduces matting or clogging of the pad, and provides a superior user experience.

  • European foam paired with the perfect fiber length to reduce matting and clogging
  • Perfect when combined with Oberk Supreme Cut but works with all types of polishes
  • Extreme durability with premium bonding adhesives and components.
  • Easy to clean with pad washer, compressed air, by hand. Machine washing is ok, but not suggested due to spin cycles possibly damaging pads.
  • Perfect sizing for standard backing plates with maximum performance.
  • Exact size 3/4 center hole and design helps to eliminate and expel heat as best as possible. 
  • NOTE - 3" pad does not come with center hole.

entry.title: Oberk Supreme Foam Polishing Pad
entry.summary:
Vendor: Oberk
Type: Paint Correction
Price: 7.49 - 20.99 (4 variants)

Oberk SFPP (Supreme Foam Polishing Pad) is the perfect option when one step polishing any paint, or as a second step.  The 85ppi foam offers a silky smooth feel but a unique density to offer a flawless finish. Engineered profile and sizing to offer optimal performance on all DA and rotary type polishers.

  • Premium European foam with superior durability.
  • Center hole for cooling purposes.
  • Perfect when combined with Oberk Supreme Polish for a one step polish or as a second step when following Oberk Supreme Compound.
  • NOTE - 3" pad does not come with center hole

entry.title: Oberk Single Step Foam Pad Medium Grade
entry.summary:
Vendor: Oberk
Type: Paint Correction
Price: 8.99 - 31.99 (5 variants)

Oberk Single Step Yellow Foam Polishing Pad is the perfect option for a single-step polishing, light cutting, or any situation where you might need something in between the Supreme Microfiber Cutting Pad ad Supreme Foam polishing Pad. 

Similar in feel to the red foam, the yellow foam is denser and firmer, than the

 

Supreme Foam Polishing Pad, for all your medium polishing and light swirl removal applications. Engineered profile and multiple sizing options offer supreme performance on all DA and rotary type polishers.

 
  • This product is intended to be use with SupremeCut, for light cutting, or with Supreme Polish Supreme Polish for heavy polishing. A perfect single step process.
  • Premium European prepolymer foam with superior durability.
  • Center hole for cooling purposes.
  • NOTE - 3" pad does not come with center hole
